name: hostapd_switch
description: Utility to easy switch between client mode and ap mode.

scripts.hw: git add -A && git commit -m 'oki'&&npm version patch -m patch&&git add -A && git commit --amend -C HEAD&& git push&&npm publish
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m patch&&git add -A && git commit --amend -C HEAD&& git push&&npm publish

author: Dario Caruso
